channel.title: [508] Really weird client problem. Rep++ for help
channel.description:
Okay, so I'm using a 508 client and until now, I've never had any problem adding custom items to the client using Applet_Sub1. But now, whenever I try to add a new item or even just change the ID of an already added item, it completely messes everything up. It basically transforms every item on the client into other random items for no reason. Here's a picture:
[IMG]http://i822.photobucket.com/albums/zz142/PhoToeBuckAwt69/Picture15-4.png[/img]
I honestly don't know how this happened. It's never happened to me before. Any ideas on what to do?

item.title: [508] Really weird client problem. Rep++ for help
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

Well it’s just fine when I undo all the changes I did. But then once I add an item or anything it does this again.

Read full topic
item.source: [508] Really weird client problem. Rep++ for help

item.title: [508] Really weird client problem. Rep++ for help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I would suggest removing each item until the appearance goes back to normal. Then you know that there’s something wrong with the last item.

Read full topic
item.source: [508] Really weird client problem. Rep++ for help
